is a village located exactly in between Vijayawada and Tenali in

. It is very near to Mangalagiri, a sixth century town. The village used to be very famous for oranges. Now, it is very famous for curry leaves. Few believe that the farmers from this village are able to make a living earning hundreds of thousands from the curry leaves. Other crops like rice, cauliflower, bananas, flowers, and vegetables are the main crops. The village contains 75% Hindus, but there are also Muslims and other religions.
